thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Mum of 2
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Mum of 2

author: Mum of 2
title: Mum of 2
text: Can only afford to shop here during sale. So love to see the sale offers. With the kids growing so fast nothing fits them for long. Sports gear is very good quality. My daughter likes to keep up with the fashion, so when the sale is on it's great to see the latest fashions included.
